thread.title: Weak Yen Helps Boost Japan Shares
thread.title_full: Weak Yen Helps Boost Japan Shares - WSJ

author: Chao Deng
title: Weak Yen Helps Boost Japan Shares
text:
A weaker Japanese yen fueled gains in Japan shares Friday after Federal Reserve Chairwoman Janet Yellen made a strong case for raising interest rates before year-end, despite instability in global markets.
The Nikkei Stock Average was up 0.9% and the S&P ASX 200 was up 0.2%. The gains came after U.S. stocks dropped overnight but pared their... To Read the Full Story, Subscribe or Sign In
